hero_description: Assess your creditworthiness, calculate your payment and save time on processing.
creditWorthiness_capture: Plan your mortgage with Finance Expert
about_description: Finance Expert Hipoteka offers comprehensive customer service when obtaining a mortgage. We cooperate with 1,650 financial experts from all over Poland, who have helped in the financing and purchase of more than 40,000 properties. We also provide our services remotely and work with clients from all over Poland.
advantages_card1_capture: Confidence in choosing the cheapest offer
advantages_card1_description: Use the most popular system for experts in Poland, compare offers from 14 leading banks and make sure you choose the cheapest loan.
advantages_card2_description: One of the best specialists in Poland will help you with a loan. You will not bear any commissions for this. The bank pays for the work of our experts.
advantages_card3_description: Prepare applications to many banks at the same time. Fill out the form yourself or with an expert, and our system will prepare a list of required documents and fill out applications.
advantages_card4_description: Use our tools no matter the time or place. Choose the best expert in your field and benefit from their expertise online or in one of 90 locations.
offer_capture: The fastest way to get the most
offer_description: Are you thinking about buying property, but don't know where to start? The property buying process doesn't have to be a nightmare if you use the help of Lendi's financial experts!
main_form_agreement: I agree to the processing of personal data. Information about the processing of your personal data - read on
